  So what's it going to be.  Oh and if your friend even
> thinks about firing again I assure you I can put this charge right in
> the path of his lasers and blow us all to bits anyway.
>

{Nightshade}

    Smirking Nightshade laughed, "Hot Rod is still his old self, I'm not.
Best that happens I throw your skid plate into a cell...worst your skid
plate gets embedded in the commanders ready room wall one deck and several
rooms beyond this one. 10 seconds left Sunhawk, can't avenge yourself on the
real one that killed your mate if you're blown to itty bitty fragments."

    Folding her arms over over her chest, not in the least scared by the
rapidly blinking charges just below her head. Her expiration would be easy
at ground zero of the blast...Sunhawk would have to dael with her fragments
thrown through his body at high velocity. Smirking she started counting
down...quite ready to let the charges blow up in all their faces.
